name: .JAAP File Extension
summary: Learn about .JAAP files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a JAAP file with People Playground (Windows). To do so, place the directory that contains your JAAP file in People Playground's Contraptions directory. After you do, the contraption your JAAP file describes will appear and be selectable in-game.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
